entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Wednesday 01 March 2023
